contest-event.event-date:
Feb. 15, 1947 D Scottish Area (Daily Herald Qualifying) Contest, Fourth Section
Scottish Area Qualifying Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest Scottish Area Qualifying Contest scottish-area-daily-herald-qualifying-co-3682 National Championship of Great Britain (Fourth Section Final) None Scotland
Fourth
Divertimento [Ball]
Usher Hall, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK Got the following Info: A history of Dalmellington Band on "oocities.org" says they played a contest in (early) 1947 where they came 7th from 8 bands. Tom Yates conducted the test piece Divertimento by Eric Ball. On your records if you select the 1947 Scottish Area (fourth section) Divertimento the results page says it is third section - and no Dalmellington Band.
Dec. 12, 2012, 5:09 p.m. Nov. 28, 2018, 3:58 p.m.
1 Bo'ness and Carriden Band Hugh Forbes
2 Leith Silver W. Tabener
3 Douglas Colliery J. Kean
4 ICI Recreation Club Silver John Faulds
